questions.text: A genie offers you one wish: Unlimited pizza or lifelong perfect WiFi. Which do you choose?

options.text: Pizza! I need that cheesy goodness

questions.text: You find a crying raccoon in a tuxedo. Your move:
Your friend says 'I'm fine' but their hair is on fire. You:
A zombie apocalypse begins. You first grab:
You accidentally send a love poem to your boss. Reaction:

options.text: Own it - start a poetry slam

questions.text: Your pet starts giving stock advice. You:
At a party, you're most likely to be:
You discover time travel. First stop:
Aliens ask to speak to Earth's leader. You:
Your superpower would be:
Perfect weekend involves:
You're given a million dollars but must spend it in 24 hours. Strategy:
In a zombie movie, you'd be:
Your brain is mostly:
You accidentally join a cult. Reaction:
Your spirit animal is:
The apocalypse comes. You save:
You discover your plant can talk. First question:
Your ideal job:
You have to fight a historical figure. Pick:

INTJ.title: üß† The Cosmic Chessmaster
INTJ.description: You're secretly running 47 contingency plans while everyone else is still on their first coffee. Your brain is part supercomputer, part conspiracy theory board. Warning: May accidentally take over small countries while bored.

INTP.title: üîç The Professional Overthinker
INTP.description: You've debated the meaning of life with your cat... and lost. Your ideas are either genius or nonsense (even you're not sure). People either find you fascinating or slightly concerning.

ENTJ.title: üíº The CEO of Chaos
ENTJ.description: You could organize a rock concert in a library. Natural leader, occasional dictator. Secretly wish meetings came with background boss music. Caution: May turn grocery lists into PowerPoints.

ENTP.title: üé≠ The Devil's Advocate
ENTP.description: You start debates for fun and keep lawyers on retainer. Your brain is a meme factory crossed with a philosophy textbook. Warning: Has convinced self that pineapple belongs on pizza (it does).

INFJ.title: üåå The Cryptic Caretaker
INFJ.description: You know everyone's secrets but pretend you don't. Your vibe is 'mysterious librarian who might be a witch'. Secretly wants to solve world hunger but will settle for perfect banana bread.

INFP.title: ü¶Ñ The Idealistic Unicorn
INFP.description: Your tears could power a small country's empathy grid. You cry at commercials but laugh during horror movies. Currently planning to save the world through interpretive dance.

ENFJ.title: üé§ The Emotional Cruise Director
ENFJ.description: You could motivate a sloth to run a marathon. Natural talent for accidentally becoming everyone's therapist. Secretly wishes life had a soundtrack and more group hugs.

ENFP.title: üéâ The Professional Enthusiast
ENFP.description: Your energy could power Las Vegas. Starts 12 hobbies before breakfast. Known for intense eye contact and forgetting where you parked. Life is one big improv show!

ISTJ.title: üì¶ The Human Spreadsheet
ISTJ.description: Your spice rack is alphabetized and it's beautiful. You have a binder for your binders. Secretly judges people who 'wing it'. The rock that prevents civilization from collapsing.

ISFJ.title: üõ°Ô∏è The Silent Guardian
ISFJ.description: You remember everyone's allergies and birthdays. The friend who brings bandaids to concerts. Secretly runs the world through carefully organized kindness. Never gets credit - doesn't want it.

ESTJ.title: üèóÔ∏è The Human Bulldozer
ESTJ.description: You make things happen whether the world is ready or not. Your planner has planners. Secretly wishes disorganization was illegal. The reason things actually get done.

ESFJ.title: üéÇ The Community Confectioner
ESFJ.description: You remember everyone's coffee order and their childhood pet's name. Master of awkward hugs and perfect potlucks. Would throw a parade for a friend's dental cleaning.

ISTP.title: üîß The MacGyver Impersonator
ISTP.description: Can fix anything with gum and paperclips. Your idea of fun is disassembling appliances. Secretly believes duct tape is spiritual. May or may not be a secret agent.

ISFP.title: üé® The Chill Rebel
ISFP.description: Too cool for rules but too kind to say so. Makes art from cereal boxes. Your vibe calms nervous animals. Secretly the most interesting person in any room.

ESTP.title: ü¶π The Chaos Gremlin
ESTP.description: You turn grocery shopping into extreme sports. Natural talent for getting into/out of trouble. Life is your personal action movie. Warning: May adopt raccoons.

ESFP.title: üåü The Human Firework
ESFP.description: You're the reason parties have noise ordinances. Born to sparkle and take too many selfies. Could charm pants off a cactus. Life is one big TikTok dance challenge.
